properties.name: Webex Room Name
properties.description: The name of the Webex room to post messages to. If using a bot, make sure to invite your bot to the room before attempting to send messages. If you don't want to use Webex, leave this blank

properties.name: Secure Cloud Analytics Alert Name
properties.description: The name of the alerts to fetch from Secure Cloud Analytics

properties.name: Secure Cloud Analytics API Key
properties.description: API connection string for Secure Cloud Analytics. For example: "email@domain.com:api_key_here". This is essentially the "Connection String" you can copy from the SCA portal without the "ApiKey " prefix. You can generate or regenerate an API key on your user page in your Secure Cloud Analytics portal. If you already have an API key for SCA in a global variable, use the group at the beginning of the workflow to set this variable to the global variable's value

properties.name: Secure Cloud Analytics Alert Status
properties.description: The status of the alerts to fetch from Secure Cloud Analytics. This should be one of the following: all, open, closed

properties.name: Webex Access Token
properties.description: The access token to use to authenticate to the Webex API. Information about using a bot, which is what we recommend, can be found here: https://developer.webex.com/docs/bots

properties.name: List of Not Blocked Device IPs
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of devices that were not blocked (by IP address)

properties.name: List of Blocked Device IPs
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of blocked devices (by IP address)

properties.name: List of Processed Device IDs
properties.description: Placeholder for a list of devices that have been processed (by device ID)

This workflow fetches alerts from Cisco Secure Cloud Analytics (SCA) for the past 24 hours based on the alert name and status provided. Observations are extracted from the alerts and devices are searched for in Cisco Secure Endpoint. If an endpoint is found, host isolation is enabled. Finally, a Webex message is sent with a summary.

Note: This workflow will only fetch the first 100 alerts. If you want to fetch more, update the limit on the "SCA - Get Alerts" activity.

Documentation: https://ciscosecurity.github.io/sxo-05-security-workflows/workflows/0014

Target Group: Default TargetGroup

Targets: AMP_Target, Secure Cloud Analytics, Webex Teams
Get SWC alerts based on workflow filters from input and create an array of observations

properties.result_message: No observations were returned by Secure Cloud Analytics

properties.description: For Each Observation Extract the Device ID and IP behind it

